newsitem.title: USA: Spartanburg Cty SD 5, S.C., won by Craigie.
newsitem.headline: Spartanburg Cty SD 5, S.C., won by Craigie.

text.p: Craigie Inc said it won $4.100 million of Spartanburg County School District No. 5, S.C., general obligation bonds, 1997, with a net interest cost of 4.74 percent.
